product_name: Black Diamond Traverse Adjustable Ski Poles - Pair
long_description: Designed for backcountry touring, the classic Black Diamond Traverse adjustable ski poles are lightweight and nimble. 2-piece lightweight aluminum shafts with FlickLock(R) Pro mechanisms allow you to adjust the length 50cm. FlickLock Pro mechanisms are secure, fast and easy to use; new low-profile stainless-steel design improves clamping force and durability. Grippy material located on the upper shafts below the actual hand grips lets you choke up on the poles while traversing steep terrain. Rubber grips give you a confident hold on the poles; fluted grip interior reduces weight. Straps hang open for easy access; strap tabs are simple to manipulate with gloves on. Black Diamond Traverse poles come equipped with 4 in. wide powder baskets.
short_description: Designed for backcountry touring, the classic Black Diamond Traverse adjustable ski poles are lightweight and nimble.
